lead_paragraph: Napoli's free-scoring, unbeaten start to the season has suggested that the departure of prolific forward Gonzalo Higuain, viewed as a crushing blow at the time, could have been a blessing in disguise.

headline.print_headline: Higuain Move May Be Blessing in Disguise for Napoli
headline.main: Higuain Move May Be Blessing in Disguise for Napoli

snippet: Napoli's free-scoring, unbeaten start to the season has suggested that the departure of prolific forward Gonzalo Higuain, viewed as a crushing blow at the time, could have been a blessing in disguise....
